thread.title: Save 15% with Advance Purchase at Ramada
thread.title_full: Save 15% with Advance Purchase at Ramada

title: Save 15% with Advance Purchase at Ramada
text:
Home > Hotel Deals > Save 15% with Advance Purchase at Ramada Save 15% with Advance Purchase at Ramada by Patricia Magaña   - September 10, 2015 at 7:54 PM 
You'll save 15 percent when you book your reservations seven or 21 days in advance (dependent on preferred hotel brand) at select Ramada hotels. Prepayment is required, and the offer is valid at participating Ramada locations in the Americas. 
The discount is available on Ramada's Best Available Rate. 
How to get this deal: For more information or to book, visit the Ramada website. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
